abstract: The evangelical group, Focus on the Family, has purchased an ad for the Super Bowl that is expected to contain an anti-abortion message.
snippet: The evangelical group, Focus on the Family, has purchased an ad for the Super Bowl that is expected to contain an anti-abortion message.
lead_paragraph: FOR 43 years, Super Bowl viewers have watched all kinds of commercials from companies that are famous (Coca-Cola) or otherwise (Cash4Gold.com), peddling everything from automobiles to Xerox copiers. But never has there been a Super Bowl spot that took sides on a contentious social issue  until now.

headline.main: An Advocacy Ad Stirs a National Debate
headline.print_headline: An Advocacy Ad Stirs a National Debate
